Package io.github.zero88.jooqx.provider

Interface DBEmbeddedProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DBProvider<java.lang.String>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DBEmbeddedProvider.DBFileProvider, DBEmbeddedProvider.DBMemoryProvider, DerbyFileProvider, DerbyMemProvider, H2FileProvider, H2MemProvider, HSQLDBFileProvider, HSQLDBMemProvider, SQLiteFileProvider, SQLiteMemProvider
    public interface DBEmbeddedProvider
extends DBProvider<java.lang.String>
    Provides an embedded database

    For example: H2, SQLite

    2.0.0
